module.name: ap203e2_configuration_management
module.keywords: module, configuration control, effectivity, configuration item

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of tracking and management of a product including the documentation of the form change and release of designs for the product.

inscope.li: specification of the use of a product version as a component of an assembly;
identification of a component of an assembly with respect to an upper level in the assembly structure;
association of a time interval with product or activity data;
definition of a project, of its responsible organization and of its planned and actual execution dates;
specification of effectivity constraints applied to the use of a product in a product that implements a configuration item.

outscope.li: activities not associated with the management of a configurations of a product.

uof.name: Ap203e2_configuration_management
uof.description: The Ap203e2_configuration_management UoF specifies the representation of tracking and management of a product including the documentation of the form change and release of designs for the product
